mapper.select:
select p.id, p.product_name, p.specification, p.material_quality, p.material_quality_spec, p.trade_mark, p.product_pic, p.patrs_pic, p.video_id, p.three_dimensional, p.product_label, p.content, p.catalog_id, p.status, p.is_recommend, p.sort, p.update_date, p.update_by, p.create_date, p.create_by, ( select c.catalog_name from tams_product_catalog c where c.id=p.catalog_id ) as catalog_name from tams_product p where 1=1
and p.catalog_id in (${catalog_id})
and p.status = '${status}'
and p.product_name like '%${product_name}%'
and p.specification like '%${specification}%'
and p.material_quality like '%${material_quality}%'
and p.tenant_id = '${tenant_id}'
order by p.create_date desc

select count(0) from tams_product p where 1=1
and p.catalog_id in (${catalog_id})
and p.status = '${status}'
and p.product_name like '%${product_name}%'
and p.specification like '%${specification}%'
and p.material_quality like '%${material_quality}%'
and p.tenant_id = '${tenant_id}'
order by p.create_date desc

select 'product' index_name, p.id product_id, p.product_name product_name, p.specification product_specification, p.material_quality product_material_quality, p.trade_mark product_trade_mark, p.product_label product_label, p.content product_content from tams_product p

select 'product' index_name, p.id product_id, p.product_name product_name, p.specification product_specification, p.material_quality product_material_quality, p.trade_mark product_trade_mark, p.product_label product_label, p.content product_content from tams_product p where p.id=#{id}
